metadata.description: Feature tracking for agent-driven development. Agents may ONLY toggle the 'passes' field. Do not edit descriptions or add/remove features.

features.name: Folder Selection
features.description: User can select a local folder via file picker dialog. The app discovers all audio files (MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, M4A, AAC) recursively.
steps: Navigate to a folder containing audio files
Verify file count displayed matches actual audio files in folder

features.name: Batch Analysis
features.description: App runs audio_analyzer.analyze_batch() on all discovered files. Shows progress bar with track name and percentage.
steps: Observe progress bar appears showing current file name
Verify all tracks appear in the library

features.name: Analysis Caching
features.description: Re-selecting the same folder skips already-analyzed tracks (matched by file hash). Only new/modified files are re-analyzed.
steps: Verify analysis completes almost instantly (0 new files to analyze)
Add a new file to the folder
Verify only the 1 new file is analyzed

features.name: Metadata Extraction
features.description: App extracts ID3/metadata tags (artist, title, album, genre) from each file and stores alongside analysis results.
steps: Select the track in the UI
Verify artist, title, and album are displayed in the inspector

features.name: Error Resilience
features.description: Corrupt or unreadable files are skipped with a warning. Analysis continues for remaining files.
steps: Place a corrupted file in the music folder
Verify error message appears for the corrupt file
Verify all other files are analyzed successfully

features.name: SQLite Storage
features.description: Analysis results are persisted in a local SQLite database. Database file is created on first run.
steps: Run app for the first time
Verify database file is created in app data directory
Verify previously analyzed tracks are still available

features.name: Track Persistence
features.description: All track data (analysis results, metadata, file paths) survives app restarts.
steps: Note their BPM, key, energy values
Verify same 3 tracks appear with identical values

features.name: Node Creation
features.description: Each analyzed track becomes a node in the graph with all analysis data attached.
steps: Verify 5 nodes appear on the graph canvas
Click each node and verify it shows correct track data

features.name: Edge Computation
features.description: Compatibility edges are computed between all track pairs using the scoring algorithm. Only edges above threshold (0.3) are stored.
steps: Verify edges appear between compatible tracks
Verify no edges appear between tracks with very different BPM and key
Check edge compatibility scores are between 0 and 1

features.name: Harmonic Scoring
features.description: Harmonic score correctly implements Camelot wheel rules: same key=1.0, adjacent=0.85, parallel=0.8, two-step=0.5.

features.name: BPM Scoring
features.description: BPM score gives 1.0 for Â±2%, 0.8 for Â±4%, 0.5 for Â±6%, lower beyond. Detects half/double time.

features.name: Full Compatibility Score
features.description: Aggregate compatibility combines all 6 sub-scores with configured weights. Weights sum to 1.0.
steps: Create two tracks with known attributes
Verify result matches manual weighted-sum calculation

features.name: Clustering (Vibe Islands)
features.description: Tracks are grouped into clusters using DBSCAN on their feature vectors. Clusters represent 'vibe islands' of sonically similar tracks.
steps: Analyze 20+ tracks with variety in energy/BPM/genre
Verify tracks within a cluster have similar characteristics

features.name: Force-Directed Layout
features.description: Nodes are positioned using force-directed layout where compatible tracks attract and incompatible repel.
steps: Verify highly compatible tracks are near each other
Verify incompatible tracks are far apart

features.name: Scatter Map Layout
features.description: Alternative layout using t-SNE/UMAP projection where proximity equals sonic similarity.
steps: Verify layout is deterministic (same data â†’ same layout)

features.name: Greedy Pathfinding
features.description: Given selected tracks, find an ordering maximizing total transition quality using greedy nearest-neighbor.
steps: Verify resulting order has higher total compatibility than original
Verify start/end track constraints are respected if set

features.name: 2-Opt Path Improvement
features.description: Greedy ordering is improved by 2-opt swaps for better total compatibility.
steps: Verify 2-opt result has >= total compatibility as greedy result

features.name: Basic Suggestions
features.description: Selecting a track shows top 8 suggested next tracks ranked by compatibility.
steps: Verify suggestions are ordered by score (highest first)
Verify scores are displayed next to each suggestion

features.name: Sequence-Aware Suggestions
features.description: When building a sequence, suggestions consider the entire sequence history, not just the last track.
steps: Verify suggestions changed to account for both A and B

features.name: Harmonic Flow Strategy
features.description: Default strategy prioritizes Camelot-compatible keys in suggestions.
steps: Verify top suggestions are predominantly 8A, 7A, 9A, or 8B

features.name: Energy Arc Strategy
features.description: Energy arc strategy targets energy levels based on set position (build up â†’ peak â†’ cool down).
steps: Verify early suggestions have moderate energy
Verify mid-set suggestions have high energy
Verify late-set suggestions have lower energy

features.name: Discovery Strategy
features.description: Discovery strategy boosts rarely-used tracks in suggestions.
steps: Mark some tracks as frequently used
Verify rarely-used tracks appear higher in suggestions
Verify never-used tracks get the strongest boost

features.name: Groove Lock Strategy
features.description: Groove lock strategy strongly prefers tracks with the same groove type.
steps: Verify top suggestions are predominantly four-on-floor

features.name: Contrast Strategy
features.description: Contrast strategy rewards energy and frequency differences for intentional variety.
steps: Verify suggestions include lower-energy and bright/balanced tracks

features.name: BPM Range Filter
features.description: User can filter suggestions to a specific BPM range.
steps: Verify all suggested tracks have BPM between 125 and 132

features.name: Key Lock Filter
features.description: Key lock filter restricts suggestions to harmonically compatible keys only.
steps: Verify all suggestions are in keys 7A, 8A, 9A, 8B, or 7B/9B

features.name: Diversity Bonus
features.description: Suggestions include a diversity bonus for tracks from different clusters than recently played.
steps: Build sequence of 5 tracks all from same cluster
Verify suggestions boost tracks from other clusters
Compare scores with and without diversity bonus active

features.name: Weight Customization
features.description: User can adjust the relative weights of harmonic, BPM, energy, groove, frequency, and mix quality in scoring.
steps: Verify suggestions change to prioritize harmonic compatibility more heavily
Verify weights are rebalanced to sum to 1.0

features.name: App Window
features.description: Desktop application opens a resizable window with a title bar, menu, and dark theme.
steps: Resize window and verify content adapts

features.name: Node Graph Canvas
features.description: Main area shows an interactive canvas where track nodes are displayed. Supports pan and zoom.
steps: Verify nodes remain interactive after pan/zoom

features.name: Node Display
features.description: Each node shows track name, BPM, key. Color-coded by key or cluster. Size varies by energy.
steps: Verify each node shows track name
Verify BPM and key labels are visible
Verify color coding is applied consistently
Verify higher-energy tracks have larger nodes

features.name: Node Selection
features.description: Clicking a node selects it, highlights connected edges, and shows details in the inspector panel.
steps: Verify node gets a selection highlight
Verify inspector panel shows track details

features.name: Node Dragging
features.description: Nodes can be dragged to reposition them on the canvas. Edges follow smoothly.
steps: Verify connected edges update in real-time
Release node and verify it stays in new position

features.name: Edge Display
features.description: Edges between nodes show compatibility. Thicker = higher compatibility. Optional color by type (harmonic, energy).
steps: Verify edges are visible between compatible tracks
Verify high-compatibility edges are thicker than low ones
Verify edges disappear for scores below threshold

features.name: Manual Edge Creation
features.description: User can draw an edge between two nodes to manually mark them as a good transition.
steps: Drag from one node's output port to another node
Verify edge is marked as user-created
Verify user-created edges persist across sessions

features.name: Track Inspector Panel
features.description: Side panel showing selected track's full analysis: artist, title, BPM, key, energy, danceability, valence, structure, and all other metrics.
steps: Verify inspector shows: title, artist, duration
Verify BPM and key are displayed
Verify all Spotify-style metrics are shown as bars
Verify DJ metrics (mix scores, groove, frequency weight) are displayed
Verify structure (drops, breakdowns) is listed with timestamps

features.name: Suggestion Panel
features.description: Panel showing top N suggested tracks with scores, strategy selector, and filter controls.
steps: Verify suggestion panel shows recommended tracks
Verify each suggestion shows compatibility score
Click a suggestion to highlight it on the graph

features.name: Playlist Panel
features.description: Panel showing the current set sequence. Tracks can be reordered, added, removed.
steps: Verify playlist panel shows ordered list
Click remove button to delete a track from sequence

features.name: Track Swap
features.description: User can swap a track in the sequence with a suggested alternative. Edges and suggestions update.
steps: Choose a suggestion from the swap options
Verify edges to neighbors are recomputed

features.name: Right-Click Context Menu
features.description: Right-clicking a node shows: Add to Sequence, Find Similar, Swap Track, Remove from Graph, Show in Folder.
steps: Verify context menu appears with all expected options
Click each option and verify correct behavior

features.name: Viewport Culling
features.description: Only nodes visible in the current viewport are rendered. Performance stays smooth with 1000+ nodes.
steps: Zoom out to see all nodes
Verify only visible nodes are fully rendered

features.name: Search and Filter
features.description: Search bar to find tracks by name, artist, BPM, or key. Results highlighted on canvas.
steps: Type artist name in search bar
Verify matching tracks are highlighted on canvas

features.name: Layout Mode Switching
features.description: User can switch between Force-Directed, Scatter Map, and Linear layout modes.
steps: Verify nodes rearrange into similarity clusters
Verify nodes arrange in a sequence line

features.name: Cluster Visualization
features.description: Vibe island clusters are visually distinct with colored backgrounds or hulls around grouped nodes.
steps: Verify each cluster has a distinct visual boundary
Verify tracks in a cluster share similar characteristics

features.name: Suggestion Highlighting
features.description: Suggested tracks glow or pulse on the graph canvas when the suggestion panel updates.
steps: Verify suggested tracks on the canvas have a glow effect
Verify glow intensity correlates with compatibility score
Verify glow shifts to new suggestions

features.name: Progress Bar During Analysis
features.description: While analyzing files, a progress bar shows current track name, track count progress, and estimated time remaining.

features.name: Add to Sequence
features.description: User can add a track to the current set sequence. Track position is tracked.
steps: Click 'Add to Sequence' or drag to playlist panel
Verify track appears in the playlist panel

features.name: Reorder Sequence
features.description: Tracks in the sequence can be reordered via drag-and-drop in the playlist panel.
steps: Verify edges on canvas update to reflect new order

features.name: Remove from Sequence
features.description: Tracks can be removed from the sequence. Node remains on graph but is no longer in the set.
steps: Verify track is removed from playlist panel

features.name: Auto-Order Sequence
features.description: User can click 'Optimize Order' to run pathfinding and reorder the sequence for best transition flow.
steps: Add 8 tracks to sequence in random order
Verify total compatibility score is displayed and improved

features.name: Set Segments / Chapters
features.description: User can group sequential tracks into labeled segments (chapters) for set structure.
steps: Select tracks 5-8 and group as 'Peak Time'
Select tracks 9-12 and group as 'Cool Down'
Verify segments are labeled in the playlist panel

features.name: M3U Export
features.description: Current sequence can be exported as an M3U playlist file referencing local audio file paths.
steps: Open .m3u file and verify it lists correct file paths

features.name: Rekordbox XML Export
features.description: Current sequence can be exported as Rekordbox-compatible XML playlist.
steps: Import into Rekordbox and verify tracks appear in correct order

features.name: CSV Export
features.description: Full library analysis data can be exported as CSV with all metrics.
steps: Verify CSV file contains all tracks
Verify columns include all analysis metrics
Open in spreadsheet and verify data integrity

features.name: Save/Load Graph State
features.description: Current graph state (node positions, sequence, settings) can be saved and reloaded.
steps: Verify node positions and sequence are restored

features.name: Large Library Handling
features.description: App handles 5000+ track libraries without UI lag. Graph renders within 3 seconds.
steps: Select nodes with no perceptible delay

features.name: Incremental Edge Computation
features.description: Adding new tracks computes edges only for new tracks vs existing library, not full recomputation.
steps: Verify only 5 Ã— 100 edge computations run (not 105Â²)

features.name: Background Analysis
features.description: Analysis runs in a background thread. UI remains responsive during processing.
steps: While analysis runs, interact with the UI
Verify canvas is pannable, nodes are clickable
Verify progress bar updates without freezing

features.name: Standalone Executable (macOS)
features.description: App can be packaged as a macOS .app bundle that runs without Python installed.
steps: Copy to a machine without Python

features.name: Standalone Executable (Windows)
features.description: App can be packaged as a Windows .exe that runs without Python installed.
steps: Copy to a machine without Python

features.name: Settings Persistence
features.description: User preferences (weight values, default strategy, UI theme, last folder) persist across sessions.
steps: Change default strategy to Energy Arc

features.name: Edge Threshold Setting
features.description: User can adjust the minimum compatibility threshold for displaying edges (default 0.3).
steps: Verify edges below 0.5 disappear from canvas
